title: Person of Interest S01E01 - Finch Explains the Machine
author: West
comment: Something about how Michael Emerson delivers "...I built it." gives me chills in this scene.
This is probably the most interesting series that has come in late years. The worldbuilding is both realistic and intriguing, and politically relevant in current times.
"I built it" is perhaps the most iconic line from this show.
I dont know this series even existed... seems incredibly awesome
One of my most favorite tv series ever. Something about bad robot production are some of my all time favs!
description: Finch explains to john about the machine that he built for the government. It monitors every phone call and watches through every camera with the ability to predict future invents with the data.
